'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* Foe AoE damage is applied to all enemies in 1.5m Radius around the initial attack target. These attacks have -10 [Accuracy](/accuracy/) penalty, and 7 [Penetration](/penetration/).
